text: If you've got it, flaunt it. Who's that girl? Marion Cotillard, the French actress and Dior ambassador known for her demure and ladylike style, showed off a new, um, look on Instagram on Monday — complete with a dark wavy wig and full pout — that had us wondering if she had found a long - lost Kardashian kousin. It was the 41 - year - old's plump lips ( which she noted were for her role in the film, Rock'n Roll, which was released last month in France ) that had her fans buzzing, with many drawing comparisons to Kylie Jenner's infamous pout, as well as the full puckers of Rose McGowan and Angelina Jolie.
